name: JumpStart!
description:
In this 3D platformer you controller a cube to move around in the world!

Avoid orange lava and jump on red trampolines!

Use WASD to move, space to jump, and Shift to stomp!

This is a small platformer with 3 levels and Controller support.

Please give feedback as this is an early build and I want to know what the community is thinking!
